reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Strengthening Quality Infrastructure for the Solar Industry
Verbesserung der qualitätssichernden Dienstleistungen für den Solarsektor

description.narrative: Das Angebot an Dienstleistungen der Qualitätsinfrastruktur, die zur Sicherung von Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit solarer Energieanlagen benötigt werden, ist unter Berücksichtigung internationaler good practices verbessert und wird vermehrt genutzt.

The project builds on achievements made within a predecessor project and aims to further improve the quality infrastructure services needed to assure quality and reliability of photovoltaic components and systems in India. It will have a wider geographical scope, e.g. include project partners in New Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore and Calcutta. The following areas of activity are planned: Firstly, improvement of services of selected metrology and testing laboratories relevant for the photovoltaic sector. Secondly, improvement of quality control mechanisms (e.g. tendering and commissioning procedures, personnel certification, photovoltaic plant evaluation and monitoring). Thirdly, capacity development and awareness raising on the relevance of quality assurance in the photovoltaic sector.

Das Angebot an Dienstleistungen der Qualitätsinfrastruktur, die zur Sicherung von Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit solarer Energieanlagen benötigt werden, ist unter Berücksichtigung internationaler good practices verbessert und wird vermehrt genutzt.

The project builds on achievements made within a predecessor project and aims to further improve the quality infrastructure services needed to assure quality and reliability of photovoltaic components and systems in India. It will have a wider geographical scope, e.g. include project partners in New Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore and Calcutta. The following areas of activity are planned: Firstly, improvement of services of selected metrology and testing laboratories relevant for the photovoltaic sector. Secondly, improvement of quality control mechanisms (e.g. tendering and commissioning procedures, personnel certification, photovoltaic plant evaluation and monitoring). Thirdly, capacity development and awareness raising on the relevance of quality assurance in the photovoltaic sector.
